page.title: 19Newcomers ctd.
page.content: John is now working in Huddersfield and the family travel to Manchester or other towns roundabout. They also have relatives scattered over England & Scotland and make visits to see them from time to time. The family is settled in Littleborough they like the life here and find the people friendly.The children-Jake aged eight years & Megan aged six years attend Stansfield Hall School,which is a small school,very much part of the community and the children have settled very happily there.They find Littleborough a particulary attractive country area.Littleborough however does lack some of the amenities which would be available in a larger city,and it would be good to see the facilities in the area improved.
